scripts.pack:win: vpk [win] pack -u NDC.StreamOverlay -v $(nbgv get-version -v semver2) -p dist/win -e ndc-stream-overlay.exe
scripts.pack:linux: vpk [linux] pack -u NDC.StreamOverlay -v $(nbgv get-version -v semver2) -p dist/linux -e ndc-stream-overlay
scripts.pack: bun run pack:win && bun run pack:linux
scripts.upload-release:win: vpk upload github --repoUrl https://github.com/ndc-tourney/stream-overlay --publish --tag $(nbgv get-version -v semver2) --targetCommitish $(git rev-parse HEAD) --token $(gh auth token) -c win
scripts.upload-release:linux: vpk upload github --repoUrl https://github.com/ndc-tourney/stream-overlay --publish --tag $(nbgv get-version -v semver2) --targetCommitish $(git rev-parse HEAD) --token $(gh auth token) -c linux
scripts.upload-release: bun run upload-release:win && bun run upload-release:linux
scripts.full-release-process: bun run cut-release && git prev -o && bun run build && bun run prepare-pack && bun run pack && bun run upload-release
